name: Rampage Recoil
description:
GMTK's 2020 Game Jam. Theme: Out of Control.  Rampage Recoil is a Top Down- Wave Based - Survival - Shooter. Made in Unreal  

Harness Oden’s strength as you blast your way through invaders.  Your empowered shotgun will send  you flying from viking to viking  as you strike them down with Odin’s hand.

Controllers:

movement:  WASD 

Pause: P or escape
